text:
Does anyone know if I can use inherited fields in a module to inherit from the theme settings

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields-overview#inherited-fields>
Ah it seems to work after refreshing a few times, but our issue now is it’s a boolean field and visibly it’s not turned on even though it’s inheriting and working on the page

Hi there, I downloaded a free module from marketplace and I would like to change the navigation arrow image in svg. I found this path src <https://cdn2.HubSpot.net/hubfs/6162256/Icons/prev.svg> in their JS codes however, I have no idea how am I able to upload my own .svg image to replace the existing one.

If anyone knows the trick, please kindly help. Thank you in advance!

purchased a theme off of envato that had good reviews and raiting, but getting the following error when trying to choose a tag for posts to be listed in the different sections.

Any idea how to investigate what is causing this error? How would I know if there’s an error in the code?
Weird, I reloaded again and it worked. I pretty much get this error everytime I try to do something but most of the time it eventually loads.
If you open the design manager and go to the module it will show an error indicator by the line number, or in the bottom left part of the screen show an error symbol you can expand to see more detail
